video.title: Wild Animal Baby Explorers
video.synopsis: This preschool-oriented nature series uses animated characters and live-action footage to expose kids to the fascinating world of wild animals.

episodes.synopsis: Izzy and the gang learn how penguins survive in frigid environments. / The group learns about animals with "pockets": marsupials.
episodes.title: Sled Stuck / Pocket Protector

episodes.synopsis: The gang learns how animals scratch itches in places they can't reach. / The crew explores how legs differ among animals, from millipedes to giraffes.
episodes.title: Scratch My Back / Legwork

episodes.synopsis: Izzy and friends learn how birds use their beaks. / The gang learns how little acorns turn into mighty oak trees.
episodes.title: Beaks and Bills / The Mighty Oak Tree

episodes.synopsis: After sighting a ladybug, the group searches for other animals with interesting markings. / The crew examines a variety of beetles.
episodes.title: Stripes and Spots / Beetle Mania

episodes.synopsis: The group learns how other animals, including rhinos and zebras, groom themselves. / The gang learns how dolphins communicate with one another.
episodes.title: Bath Time / Diving Dolphins

episodes.synopsis: The friends explore geese and other migrating animals. / The gang learns about creatures that use their colors to blend into their surroundings.
episodes.title: Fly Away Home / Hide and Seek

episodes.synopsis: When the friends explore a coral reef, they learn how all the creatures live together. / The gang learns about animals with limited diets.
episodes.title: Side by Side / Picky Eaters

episodes.synopsis: The group learns about animals suited to their environments. / When the gang sets off to find bananas, the quest leads them various kinds of monkeys.
episodes.title: Good Grips / Monkey Around

episodes.synopsis: The explorers learn about the characteristics of hippos. / The group embarks on a mission to find out all about turtles.
episodes.title: Hurray for Hippos / Shell Game

episodes.synopsis: Izzy and Benita hide berries in a tree. When they disappear, the group aims to find the culprit. / The team wants to start a band.
episodes.title: Missing Berries / Marsh Music

episodes.synopsis: The explorers set off on a quest to find some leaping frogs. / The gang learns about the differing shapes and sizes of animal noses.
episodes.title: Frog Hop / By a Nose

episodes.synopsis: The group studies leaf-cutter ants and other creatures that work as a team. / The gang learns how some animals prepare for winter.
episodes.title: Crowd Pleasers / Ready for Winter

episodes.synopsis: The group learns about the unique characteristics of zebras. / A kite stuck in a tree leads the gang to explore the distinctive traits of giraffes.
episodes.title: Z Is for Zebra / What's Up, Giraffes?

episodes.synopsis: The gang goes on a treasure hunt for all the colors of the rainbow found in nature. / While at the beach, the group investigates crabs.
episodes.title: Rainbow Treasure Hunt / Crab Walk

episodes.synopsis: The group goes exploring in the sea and learns about the characteristics of sea horses. / The gang learns about animals that live in snowy habitats.
episodes.title: A Seahorse, of Course! / Seeing Snow Prints

episodes.synopsis: The group investigates several slow-moving animals, including snails and tortoises. / The explorers learn about various spiders and their behaviors.
episodes.title: Slow Down! / Itsy Bitsy Spider

episodes.synopsis: The explorers learn about the many types of bird nests. / The group examines the eyes of various animals and how they see in different ways.
episodes.title: Home Tweet Home / Eye Spy!

episodes.synopsis: The gang investigates the ways and reasons that creatures dig on land and under water. / The group learns how animals use their spines for protection.
episodes.title: Dig This! / Sharp Dressers

episodes.synopsis: The explorers seek other birds to find out why some of them like to show off. / The gang learns about the behaviors and characteristics of wild cats.
episodes.title: Show Offs / Hello Kitties!

episodes.synopsis: The group sets out to learn about coyotes and their behaviors. / The explorers investigate how various animals use their tails.
episodes.title: Clever Coyotes / Telling Tails

episodes.synopsis: The group investigates animals that have horns and antlers. / The gang dives in for a look at sea creatures with soft bodies, including jellyfish.
episodes.title: Head Gear / Sea Softies

episodes.synopsis: The gang learns all about reptiles, including lizards, iguanas and alligators. / The explorers set off with Miss Sally to learn about grizzly bears.
episodes.title: Scales and Tails / Bear Facts

episodes.synopsis: The gang sets out to learn how baby animals are carried by their mothers. / The friends don their scuba gear to explore a coral reef full of sea life.
episodes.title: Wild Ride / Colorful Coral Reefs

episodes.synopsis: Miss Sally and the gang help Sammy fall asleep. / Miss Sally and the explorers visit a tropical rain forest full of wild and colorful wonders.
episodes.title: Sleepy Time / Rainforest Wonders

episodes.synopsis: While singing "Old MacDonald Had a Farm" during a hike, the gang adds wild-animal sounds to the song. / The explorers learn about river otters.
episodes.title: Talk Show / Romp of Otters

episodes.synopsis: The friends learn about eggs and the different kinds of animals that hatch from them. / The group explores creatures that hang upside down.
episodes.title: Eggciting Eggs / Upside Down

episodes.synopsis: The team learns how animals use their senses to protect themselves. / The explorers visit the Kalahari Desert and the unique lives of meerkats.
episodes.title: Makes Sense to Me / Meet the Meerkats

episodes.synopsis: The team learns how different animals use their teeth to survive in their unique environments. / The group goes in search of wildlife that have wings.
episodes.title: Nothing But the Tooth / Things with Wings

episodes.synopsis: The group wonders what kinds of animals have armor to protect themselves. / The team learns about animals that transform as they become adults.
episodes.title: Best Defense / Big Change

episodes.synopsis: The team visits the life of gelada monkeys and learns how they survive.
episodes.title: Whole Lot of Geladas / Mother Knows Best

episodes.synopsis: The team decides to find out how animals in the wild build their houses. / The team learns about the largest land animal: the elephant.
episodes.title: Busy Builders / Elephant Walk

episodes.synopsis: The team wonders about the gold-medal-worthy special abilities animals have. / The group discovers that each animal has a unique way of moving.
episodes.title: Go for Gold / Let's Move

episodes.synopsis: The team thinks that all animals with wings must be able to fly, but they learn that's not always the case. / The team explores wildlife that swim.
episodes.title: Flightless Birds / In the Swim

episodes.synopsis: The group is curious about how animals use their tongues in the wild. / The team goes on an exploration to learn how animals survive in deserts.
episodes.title: Tongue Twisters / Just Deserts

episodes.synopsis: Benita shows the team the unique characteristics of beavers. / The group learns how animals cope with using paws, not hands, in their environments.
episodes.title: Eager Beavers / Hands On

episodes.synopsis: The explorers go in search of animals that live in wide-open spaces. / While at the beach, the team finds a tidal pool that's teeming with life!
episodes.title: Wide Open Spaces / Beach Party

episodes.synopsis: The team goes on an underwater adventure to learn about fish. / The group explores all the signs of spring.
episodes.title: Gone Fishing / Spring Has Sprung

episodes.synopsis: The team learns about mountain animals. / The group searches for animals whose names give them their appearance of other animals in the wild.
episodes.title: King of the Mountain / Name Game

episodes.synopsis: The group decides to learn about the wildlife in their own backyard. / The explorers take a rare look into the world of snow leopards in China.
episodes.title: Backyard Bugs / Snow Leopards

episodes.synopsis: The team goes on a journey to see how wild horses live. / The group discovers that playtime for animals is a way to learn valuable life lessons.
episodes.title: Hey There, Horses! / Playtime
